data.title: Lake Mendocino water levels trigger curtailments for all water fights in upper Russian River
data.excerpt: With California experiencing a historic drought amid worsening climate change impacts, the state is responding urgently to address acute water supply shortfalls in affected areas.
data.author: Chach Sikes
